# <- Cart Feature ->

- Applied Cart in /cart route to list the products for checking out in the local storage.

| -------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| Destination Branch                           | `feature/cart`                                                                            |                                                                                 |
| Change type                                  | `New Feature` |
